onsetsample.Description: Sample number at which the event occurred.

eventnumber.Description: Sequential number assigned to each event.

subjectnr.Description: Subject number associated with the event.

sequencenumber.Description: Sequence number of the event in the task.

blocksequencenumber.Description: Sequence number of the block in which the event occurred.

istarget.Description: Whether the event was a target stimulus.

presentationnumber.Description: Number representing the order of the event presentation.

stimnumber.Description: Identifier for the stimulus presented during the event.

stim.Description: Relative file path to the stimulus presented.

time_stimon.Description: Time in seconds when the stimulus turned on.

time_stimoff.Description: Time in seconds when the stimulus turned off.

correct.Description: Whether the participant's response was correct.
